name: Groop.ly
overview:
Groop.ly enables everyone with a cell phone to create real time group chats.

Remember the days of AOL chat rooms when you could talk to all of your friends in real time? Weâ€™re recreating that experience for all cell phone users, and then weâ€™re adding some really cool features on top of that. It doesnâ€™t matter if you have the iPhone 4G or a Nokia 3310, you can use groop.ly. Trying to organize your friends and decide on a bar for the night? groop.ly lets you solve your problems in real time. Need to see when the family will be home for dinner? groop.ly can help with one simple group chat. Want to coordinate a video shoot with your crew? We can help you do that. Anytime you want to mobilize, organize, and keep in touch with the people you talk to in a real time group setting, groop.ly makes it easy. Oh, and itâ€™s totally free and dead simple to use.
